thread.title: Boy pricked by used drug needle while playing in park | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Boy pricked by used drug needle while playing in park | Daily Mail Online

author: Cindy Tran For Daily Mail Australia
title: Boy pricked by used drug needle while playing in park | Daily Mail Online
text: Boy, 4, stabbed himself in the STOMACH with a used drug needle he found in a park - as parents face a three month wait to see if he's infected with hepatitis or HIV A four-year-old boy was pricked by a needle when he was playing in a parkland Little John Williams was playing with his family at in Barney Point, Queensland His mother Angela Moore said her son was metres from her when he hurt himself She rushed her son to the hospital after the family found up to 20 syringes They will have to wait three months for the blood test results to return for John
